BoxInterface.name: Light_AskForAttentionEyes
BoxInterface.tooltip:
Set an animated gaze which calls for attention (purple eyes).
Note: It is a never ending box. You must call onStop to stop it.
*** state: 5a_release *** *** ref box in: 5a_release\Leds\Light_AskForAttentionEyes\Light_AskForAttentionEyes.xar *** *** last modification date(svn): Version it! ***

Input.name: onLoad
Input.tooltip: Signal sent when diagram is loaded.

Input.name: onStart
Input.tooltip: Box behavior starts when a signal is received on this input.

Input.name: onStop
Input.tooltip: Box behavior stops when a signal is received on this input.

Output.name: onStopped
Output.tooltip: Signal sent when box behavior is finished.
